text.english: Household head name (Probe the identity of the household head by asking who is the chief decision maker of major decisions like marital alliances, migration, borrowing.)

Introduction:
Greetings, we are currently surveying all the households in the village to get their basic information as well as details on the current status of service delivery and quality of public goods. We will be using this information toward building a village development plan.
Household is present and will continue with the survey
Household is not willing to continue with the survey
Household is not there (migrated or have not been able to locate family members)
Members of the household are no longer alive
This interview is voluntary. Would you like to continue with this survey?

Name of the respondent 
(Try and have the respondent be the household head)
If yes, how many children do you have?
What level of schooling are they enrolled in? (Mark all types of schools attended)
Are any of the schools your children attend in the village?
Is this pre school in the village?
Is this primary school in the village?
Is this upper primary school in the village?
Is this secondary school in the village?
Is this senior secondary school in the village?
Is this state or central university in the village?
Is this polytechnic college in the village?
Is this ITI/Training/Diploma institution in the village?
Are any of your children still studying?
Is anyone in your household differently abled/disabled?

How many members live in your household? (Note:  A household is defined as all the people, including children, who: i)lived under this �roof� or within the same house at least 30 days during the past year and are expected to continue doing so; ii) when they are together, they share food from a common source/kitchen)
What is your voter ID number?
Do you have a voter ID?
What groups are they part of?
Is any woman in this household currently a member of any women's groups?
What status is your smart card?
Is your household on the BPL list?
Are basic food items purchased from the Ration shop sufficient for your family?
Does this household have any of the following cards?
Does the person who takes food last, get enough to eat?
How many times a day do you eat?
Approximately, how much do you spend on the purchase of vegetables in a month?
How often do you consume vegetables?
How often do you consume fruits?
Approximately, how much do you spend on the purchase of fruits in a month?
How often do you consume meat?
Approximately, how much do you spend on the purchase of meat in a month?
Does this household receive LPG subsidies?
What is the primary fuel used for cooking?
Not employed but other income (pensions, disability etc.)
Unemployed but looking for a job
Does any one in this house hold have a government job?
How much does this household earn in a month?
How many earning members are there in your family in total?
What type of livelihood activity are you engaged in?
If yes, are you or anyone in your household going to work under the NREGS program?
If yes, how many days did this household work in the last year?
Unable to do hard physical work/ work is too hard
Does your household have a NREGS card?
If yes, are they currently employed?
If yes, where are they employed?
Has anyone in your family received skills training?
Was this house built under any scheme?
CM Solar Powered Green House Scheme

Pit Latrine  
With slab/Ventilated Improved Pit
Night soil disposed into open drain

Service Latrine  
Night soil removed by human
If private toilet, what type of toilet?
Does your toilet have a soak pit?
Once in a couple of days
How often does it get cleaned?
Do you want to build your own toilet?
Why don't you have a toilet?
Where do you go to defecate?
Once in a couple of days
How often does it get collected?
Where do you deposit your solid waste?
Does your solid waste get collected?
How clean would you say your street is?
During the year does your street face any water logging?
Are you satisfied with the cleanliness of your street?
What is your households source of water for cleaning, bathing and washing?
Once in a couple of days
How often do you get water?
Have you paid for water in the last year?
Is the water you receive adequate for your daily needs?
Do you treat your water to make it safer to drink?
Filtered with water filter (candle, ceramic, sand, etc.)
What do you usually do to the water to make it safer to �drink
Do you face any problems with your water supply?
What is your households source of  drinking water?
How many hours in a day do you have electricity?
Have you paid for electricity in the last year?
Once in a couple of days
How frequently do you face powercuts?
Disconnected due to inability to pay
Why haven't you applied for a connection?
Have you applied for an electricity connection?
Do you have an electricity connection?
Extended or repaired the house this year
Were these assets purchased in the last five years?
Extended or repaired the house this year
Do you have any of these assets now?
Overall how satisfied are you with the transport provided to your habitation?
What problems do you have with transport in your habitation?
What are the most frequent modes of transportation you and members of your household use to commute?
Which of the following insurance policies do you or your family have?
Tamil Nadu health insurance scheme / CM Medical Insurance
What medical insurance do you have?
Is anyone in your family insured?
Are you or any one in your family eligible for any of the following schemes?
Do you or any one in your family receive benefits for any of the following schemes?
Food for children in the household
Vitamin/iron supplements to the women in the household
Has this household received any of the following assistance from the ICDS centre?
Do children in the house eat the food provided by school under mid-day meal scheme?
Did you receive any educational grant/ scholarship from the government?
Are any children of the household part of any SSA bridge school?
Did you take any educational loan from the government for any child in your household?
Do the teachers come to school on time?
How frequently to teachers come to school?
Does the school have running water?
How clean would you say the school is?
How satisfied are you with your children's schooling facilities?
Are you satisfied with your children's schooling facilities in this village?
Have you paid any of the following taxes in the last year?
Do you have more than one exisitng loan?
Who have you taken loans from in the last 12 months?
Has anyone in this household tried to take a loan in the last 12 months?
Has your household deposited savings in any of these institutions?
Which committees are they part of?
Is anyone in this household part of any panchayat committees?
What local government are these household members part of?
Is anyone in this household part of local government?
Overall how satisfied are you with the services provided by the village government?
Overall how satisfied are you with your village?
What are the three most important issues that the village faces currently?
Overall how satisfied are you with your life these days?
Can you please give me your phone number? If not available, please give us the number of any other members of your household?
